column1: A visitation for Grace Larson will be held on Sunday
column3: 2015 from 4:00 until 7:00 PM at the Blanchardville Lutheran Church in Blanchardville
column4: and Monday morning before the service at 10:00 AM. A funeral service will be held on Monday
column6: 2015 at 11:00 AM at the church. Rev. Margo Martens will officiate. Burial will be in the Graceland Cemetery in Blanchardville. The Saether Funeral Home in Blanchardville is assisting the family.
